Welcome to the FuturePack modification for Minecraft.
This mod is all about futurism and space travel.
The Redsnake-Team wishes you fun with exploring and discovering.
Your first task is to find the 12 aspects in the "Story"-Tab. Use the E-Scanner for this and analyze the corresponding objects in your environment!
Use §lshift + right-click§r to scan a block or a life-form.
